name: Chub Town
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 35.

A game about building a town and pleasing gods. To win it's necessary to build the large statue to gods. But to do that, you will have to build a large town that can sustain itself, keep the gods happy, while stockpiling resources to build the large statue.

Please the gods by sacrificing unneeded resources to them using the small statue. Keep in mind, you do NOT want to get the gods angry. They will start shapeshifting your buildings into large chicken!

Use Left Mouse button to interact with things, and Right Mouse button to cancel.

ALT+ENTER to go fullscreen.

If you got any questions, contact me on twitter. https://twitter.com/Namatnieks
